gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 117, Grizzlies 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Grizzlies, 117-106. Paul George led the Clippers with 23 points and seven rebounds as James Harden (16 points, 13 assists) and Ivica Zubac (15 points, 20 rebounds) totaled 31 points. Jaren Jackson Jr. (22 points), Marcus Smart (22 points), and Ja Morant (19 points, 10 assists, and six rebounds) led Memphis in the loss. The Clippers improve to 19-12 as the Grizzlies move to 10-21.
